ComicInfo.Title: In Pictopia!
ComicInfo.Summary: In Pictopia!: Nocturno strolls through the deconstructed ruins of the comic industry.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-20 22:15:11. [CVDB841690] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:00:59. [Issue ID 2215361]
